title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H1 - Feb 12 2022
itunes:title: Weekly Review with Clay and Buck H1 - Feb 12 2022
description:
Truckers, Rogan, covid expose "The Great Unraveling." Did obese, middle-aged Stacey Abrams just lose the Georgia governor's race by posting a photo of herself unmasked with masked schoolchildren? Clay says, yes, he thinks she just lost again. Even The View calls her out. Go Fund Me trying to divert $9M of funds to support Canada truckers to those with opposing views. Clay said it made his "jaw drop," when almost nothing surprises him. The horrendous death toll of Black Lives Matter. "BLM is based on a lie," Buck says. C&B take some calls to close out the hour, including an L.A. cop that calls tales of hatred for police "fake news." And a man questioning Go Fund Me: Has there been fraud before?

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:

Clay said it made his "jaw drop," when almost nothing surprises him. The horrendous death toll of Black Lives Matter. "BLM is based on a lie," Buck says.
